default.$description: Used for the icon color of an unchecked toggle switch in the default state.

hover.$description: Used for the icon color of an unchecked toggle switch in the hover state.

focus.$description: Used for the icon color of an unchecked toggle switch in the focus state.

active.$description: Used for the icon color of an unchecked toggle switch in the active state.

default.$description: Used for the icon color of a checked toggle switch in the default state.

hover.$description: Used for the icon color of a checked toggle switch in the hover state.

focus.$description: Used for the icon color of a checked toggle switch in the focus state.

active.$description: Used for the icon color of a checked toggle switch in the active state.

disabled.$description: Used for the icon color of a disabled toggle switch.
